com.solacesystems.jcsmp

Class JCSMPRuntime

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.solacesystems.jcsmp.JCSMPStats
      • com.solacesystems.jcsmp.JCSMPRuntime

  • public class JCSMPRuntime
extends JCSMPStats
    JCSMPRuntime provides JCSMP VM-wide runtime information, such as JCSMP version information, supported protocol stacks, and global statistics.

    In addition to the session statistics defined in StatType, global statistics are defined in RuntimeStatType.
